name: csgorep-badge-extension
description: A browser extension that displays a badge on Steam profile pages showing user reputation statistics from the CSGORep API.

scripts.build: node scripts/build.mjs chrome && node scripts/build.mjs firefox
scripts.pack: npm run pack:chrome && npm run pack:firefox && npm run clean
scripts.pack:chrome: npm run build:chrome && cd dist/chrome && zip -r ../csgorep-badge-chrome.zip .
scripts.pack:firefox: npm run build:firefox && cd dist/firefox && zip -r ../csgorep-badge-firefox.xpi .
